escape.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_ITERATORS_ESCAPE_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_ITERATORS_ESCAPE_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // escape.hpp
00011

00018 
00019 #include <cassert>
00020 #include <cstddef> // NULL
00021 
00022 #include <boost/config.hpp> // for BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME
00023 #include <boost/iterator/iterator_adaptor.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/iterator/iterator_traits.hpp>
00025 
00026 namespace boost { 
00027 namespace archive {
00028 namespace iterators {
00029 
00031 // insert escapes into text
00032 
00033 template<class Derived, class Base>
00034 class escape : 
00035     public boost::iterator_adaptor<
00036         Derived, 
00037         Base, 
00038         BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME boost::iterator_value<Base>::type,
00039         single_pass_traversal_tag,
00040         BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME boost::iterator_value<Base>::type
00041     >
00042 {
00043     typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME boost::iterator_value<Base>::type base_value_type;
00044     typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME boost::iterator_reference<Base>::type reference_type;
00045     friend class boost::iterator_core_access;
00046 
00047     typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME boost::iterator_adaptor<
00048         Derived, 
00049         Base, 
00050         base_value_type,
00051         single_pass_traversal_tag,
00052         base_value_type
00053     > super_t;
00054 
00055     typedef escape<Derived, Base> this_t;
00056 
00057     void dereference_impl() {
00058         m_current_value = static_cast<Derived *>(this)->fill(m_bnext, m_bend);
00059         m_full = true;
00060     }
00061 
00062     //Access the value referred to 
00063     reference_type dereference() const {
00064         if(!m_full)
00065             const_cast<this_t *>(this)->dereference_impl();
00066         return m_current_value;
00067     }
00068 
00069     bool equal(const this_t & rhs) const {
00070         if(m_full){
00071             if(! rhs.m_full)
00072                 const_cast<this_t *>(& rhs)->dereference_impl();
00073         }
00074         else{
00075             if(rhs.m_full)
00076                 const_cast<this_t *>(this)->dereference_impl();
00077         }
00078         if(m_bnext != rhs.m_bnext)
00079             return false;
00080         if(this->base_reference() != rhs.base_reference())
00081             return false;
00082         return true;
00083     }
00084 
00085    void increment(){
00086         if(++m_bnext < m_bend){
00087             m_current_value = *m_bnext;
00088             return;
00089         }
00090         ++(this->base_reference());
00091         m_bnext = NULL;
00092         m_bend = NULL;
00093         m_full = false;
00094     }
00095 
00096     // buffer to handle pending characters
00097     const base_value_type *m_bnext;
00098     const base_value_type *m_bend;
00099     bool m_full;
00100     BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME boost::iterator_value<Base>::type m_current_value;
00101 public:
00102     escape(Base base) : 
00103         super_t(base),
00104         m_bnext(NULL),
00105         m_bend(NULL),
00106         m_full(false)
00107     {
00108     }
00109 };
00110 
00111 } // namespace iterators
00112 } // namespace archive
00113 } // namespace boost
00114 
00115 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_ITERATORS_ESCAPE_HPP
